bio.short: From telecommunications to software development. I build scalable web applications and design robust network infrastructure. Combining 4+ years of industry experience with modern development practices.
bio.long: I'm a full-stack JavaScript developer with a unique journey that spans from hands-on telecommunications infrastructure to cutting-edge software development. My career began in the trenches of network installation and troubleshooting at Telkom Indonesia, where I learned the fundamentals of how digital systems actually work in the real world. After 3+ years of optimizing network performance, I transitioned to Hacktiv8's intensive bootcamp, emerging with skills to create both web and mobile applications. Today, I combine this dual expertise at Varnion Technology, where I've achieved a 40% reduction in connectivity issues while also developing internal tools and applications.
bio.mission: I believe the best software solutions come from understanding both the technical infrastructure and the user experience. My mission is to create applications that not only look great and function perfectly, but also perform optimally in real-world network conditions.

workExperience.title: Staff Infrastructure
workExperience.description: Leading network infrastructure projects for hospitality industry clients. Achieved 40% reduction in connectivity issues through systematic monitoring and optimization.
responsibilities: Network device installation, configuration, and maintenance across hotel client sites
Regular monitoring and troubleshooting using Mikrotik and Ubiquiti tools
Structured cabling and server rack setups for improved organization
Cross-functional collaboration with NOC and support teams
Development of internal tools and applications

achievements.description: Reduced connectivity issues through systematic monitoring and optimization
Consistent internet performance and uptime across hotel client sites

workExperience.title: Provisioning Technician
workExperience.description: Managed fiber optic installations and internet service provisioning. Reduced repeat visits by 25% through quality workmanship and customer education.
responsibilities: Installation and configuration of IndiHome internet services
On-site troubleshooting and signal quality testing using OTDR and OPM tools
Coordination with NOC and customer service teams for issue resolution
Customer education on equipment usage and maintenance

achievements.description: Reduced repeat visits through quality workmanship and customer education
Faster service activation times and improved customer experience

education.description: Intensive bootcamp covering modern web development, including React, Node.js, and full-stack JavaScript. Successfully completed with 100% graduation rate.

projects.title: Mobile-FB
projects.shortDescription: A comprehensive full-stack social media application demonstrating mobile development with GraphQL and real-time features.
projects.fullDescription: Complete social media platform built from scratch during Hacktiv8 bootcamp. Handles user registration, post creation, real-time interactions, and social features like following/followers, maintaining smooth performance across iOS and Android.
features: User authentication with JWT and secure token storage
Real-time post feed with comments and likes
